entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Maniwaki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 1:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -23.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -28.7°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
